flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 minutes in an hour so 1 hour 20 minutes = (60+20) minutes = 80 minutes
He will spend a total of 80+10 = <<80+10=110>>110 minutes
110 minutes is = (60/60) hours and 50 minutes = 1 hour 50 minutes = 0130 in 24-hr time
He has to leave 0150 hours earlier than 0900 i.e. 0900-0150 = 0710 hours
#### 0710

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 90, not 110. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
